text: @Jim_Jordan Trump failed to order production of tests & extra medical supplies early, Gym. When the first cases of COVID-19 were known in China, Trump should have immediately prepared to limit spread of the virus here instead of saying it would go away. COVID-19 didn't go away,  did it?
